trans-unit.source: Indicates if a bank is deleted or still in use.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if a bank is deleted or still in use.

target.mrk: 表示銀行已刪除或仍在使用中。

trans-unit.source: <source>BUTTON_MB_MARK_UNMARK_DELETED</source> <metadata> <othermeta content="D9C0D155FE867B43E10000000A4450E5" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_ID"/> <othermeta content="HELPX.MODS_XRAY_FIN_MANAGEBANKS" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TECH_NAME"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/> <othermeta content="MODS_PRIMARY" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_GROUP"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_SHH_KEY"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TRANSLATION_MEMORY"/> <othermeta content="TR" name="LOIO.FOLDER.TERM_DOMAIN"/> <othermeta content="DTA_CON" name="LOIO.IWB_TYPE"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="LOIO.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.IWB_SHH_KEY"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_context"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_page_url"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_system"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_tour_alias"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_environment"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.CLASS"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.OBJID"/> <othermeta content="CLOUDSUITE" name="PHIO.IWB_INDUSTRY"/> <othermeta content="170" name="PHIO.RELEASE"/> <othermeta content="20160111173422" name="PHIO.CREATED_AT"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="PHIO.CREATED_BY"/> <othermeta content="20160111173423" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_AT"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_BY"/> <othermeta content="" name="PHIO.IWB_LEVEL"/> </metadata>

<source>BUTTON_MB_MARK_UNMARK_DELETED</source> <metadata> <othermeta content="D9C0D155FE867B43E10000000A4450E5" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_ID"/> <othermeta content="HELPX.MODS_XRAY_FIN_MANAGEBANKS" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TECH_NAME"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/> <othermeta content="MODS_PRIMARY" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_GROUP"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_SHH_KEY"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TRANSLATION_MEMORY"/> <othermeta content="TR" name="LOIO.FOLDER.TERM_DOMAIN"/> <othermeta content="DTA_CON" name="LOIO.IWB_TYPE"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="LOIO.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.IWB_SHH_KEY"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_context"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_page_url"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_system"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_tour_alias"/> <othermeta content="" name="xray_environment"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.CLASS"/> <othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.OBJID"/> <othermeta content="CLOUDSUITE" name="PHIO.IWB_INDUSTRY"/> <othermeta content="170" name="PHIO.RELEASE"/> <othermeta content="20160111173422" name="PHIO.CREATED_AT"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="PHIO.CREATED_BY"/> <othermeta content="20160111173423" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_AT"/> <othermeta content="C5100509" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_BY"/> <othermeta content="" name="PHIO.IWB_LEVEL"/> </metadata>

Marking a bank as deleted indicates that your company or your customers or your suppliers no longer actively use that bank to transact business. Because of historical data and legal reasons, however, it is not possible to truly delete a bank. A bank marked as deleted will still appear in your list of bank accounts unless you choose to hide it by selecting <emphasis>No</emphasis> in the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> drop-down list and then clicking <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: Marking a bank as deleted indicates that your company or your customers or your suppliers no longer actively use that bank to transact business.
Because of historical data and legal reasons, however, it is not possible to truly delete a bank.

A bank marked as deleted will still appear in your list of bank accounts unless you choose to hide it by selecting <emphasis>No</emphasis> in the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> drop-down list and then clicking <uicontrol>Go</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 將銀行標記為刪除，表示您的公司、客戶或供應商不再啟用該銀行以進行交易。
然而，由於歷史記錄資料和法律原因，因此無法真正刪除銀行。
標記為已刪除的銀行仍會顯示在銀行帳戶清單，除非您在 <uicontrol>[標記為已刪除]</uicontrol> 下拉式清單中選擇 <emphasis>[否]</emphasis> 並按一下 <uicontrol>[開始]</uicontrol>，將其隱藏。

trans-unit.source: You can reactivate a bank by unmarking it.

seg-source.mrk: You can reactivate a bank by unmarking it.

target.mrk: 您可以藉由取消標記重新啟用銀行。

trans-unit.source: All banks initially have the status of <uicontrol>No</uicontrol> for the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> filter.

seg-source.mrk: All banks initially have the status of <uicontrol>No</uicontrol> for the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> filter.

target.mrk: 針對 <uicontrol>[標記為已刪除]</uicontrol> 篩選，所有銀行的初始狀態皆為 <uicontrol>[否]</uicontrol>。

trans-unit.source: To mark a bank for deletion, open a bank, and then choose the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> button in the object page.

seg-source.mrk: To mark a bank for deletion, open a bank, and then choose the <uicontrol>Mark as Deleted</uicontrol> button in the object page.

target.mrk: 若要將銀行標記為已刪除，則在物件頁面中選擇 <uicontrol>[標記為已刪除]</uicontrol> 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For a bank account that has been marked as deleted, you can choose the <uicontrol>Unmark as Deleted</uicontrol> button to reactivate it for use.

seg-source.mrk: For a bank account that has been marked as deleted, you can choose the <uicontrol>Unmark as Deleted</uicontrol> button to reactivate it for use.

target.mrk: 針對標記為已刪除的銀行帳戶，您可選擇 <uicontrol>[取消標記為已刪除]</uicontrol> 按鈕來將其重新啟用。
